author: Garrey Dawson
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Boil the sprouts in salted water for about 3-4 minutes, then drain. Heat the oil in an ovenproof frying pan and fry the sprouts along with the herbs and garlic for 1-2 minutes. Transfer the pan to the oven and continue to cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the sprouts are tender. Serve in a gratin dish.
ingredients: 225g/8oz Brussels sprouts, trimmed,  2 tbsp olive oil,  2 sprigs fresh rosemary, chopped,  3 sprigs fresh thyme, chopped,  2 garlic cloves, roughly chopped
